Authors: Julia M Kreiner, George Sandler, Aaron J Stern, Patrick J Tranel, Detlef Weigel, John R Stinchcombe, Stephen I Wright, et al.
Title: Repeated origins, widespread gene flow, and allelic interactions of target-site herbicide resistance mutations
Notes: Population genomics of herbicide resistance in A. tuberculatus; demonstrates repeated de novo origins and gene flow shaping TSR alleles; reports allele ages and haplotype competition.
